This appears to be the 'new' book by Osprey, which I asked for info. about a
while ago.
From other peoples comments, it looks as though it's probably just a
compilation of already-published Osprey books (I'm always suspicious of any
purported 'new' book that doesn't have a bibliography!!!). Osprey have a
nasty habit of reprinting old books with new covers - thus giving the
impression that the book is new - or combining several old Ospreys into one,
larger so-called 'new' one. I mailed Stephen Turnbull twice via his web page
address for more information, but he hasn't bothered to reply!
Thanks for the update
Michael

Noble on
> the Web at $17.95,  40 % off the cover.  This is the first week the book
is in
> the stores too, so it appears B & N is not suspecting high sales.  Jack
Murphy,
